about_the_game:
A unique puzzle... a huge mad contraption to ponder over, made of upcycled things. Slowly and carefully work levers, pull cords, rotate wheels... observe the effects and deliberate, and gradually fathom its workings. Work-out how to work small parts of the bigger contraption and eventually figure-out how to use it all together to bake a loaf of bread.

A tricky puzzle, but relax. Half an hour here, 10 minutes there...have a ponder and come back to it, sleep on it. TraptionBakery is made to amuse, baffle, perplex and interest you for weeks.
TOP TIP: move the levers slowly...and adjust your view to see anything the lever moves.


When you're not in a puzzle solving mood just zoom-way-in, look around and marvel at all the crazy upcyclepunk things. This game was a four year labour of love: programming, and drawing hundreds of things for the contraption. Hardly any drawing is there just for show, most of it has a function.

When you work-out how to bake bread then the simulation aspect of the game comes into play: you will be presented with a critique of how good your loaf was and you can improve your technique for better scores. Could you even become one of the elite few world-wide to achieve a Master Baker's Licence? (See achievements.)

TraptionBakery can be played full screen, or in a smaller window.
(TraptionBakery may work on computers with a slower than specified in the Minimum System Requirements but panning and zooming will be jerky.)

name: TraptionBakery

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2GHz or faster.
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphics hardware supported by DirectX Almost all graphics hardware supported.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound hardware supported by OpenAL. Almost all sound hardware supported.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“A wonderful unique Indie game, that has a place in my heart.”
Gaming Couch Potato

“... quirky, different and fun.”
Buy it now – Indie Gaming Social

“... the original mix of gameplay, charming artwork and low price make it easy to recommend!”
Recommended – Indie Hive
short_description: A huge and detailed, fully functional mad contraption. Fathom how on Earth you can bake some bread with it, or marvel at it's madness. Upcyclepunk at its best.
